citation.article-title: Virgibacillus koreensis sp. nov., a novel bacterium from a salt field, and transfer of Virgibacillus picturae to the genus Oceanobacillus as Oceanobacillus picturae comb. nov. with emended descriptions.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Oceanobacillus picturae (Heyrman et al. 2003) comb. nov.
Oceanobacillus picturae (pic.tuâ€²rae. L. gen. n. picturae pertaining or belonging to a painting).
Basonym: Virgibacillus picturae Heyrman et al. 2003.
The description matches that given by Heyrman et al. (2003).
The type strain is strain LMG 19492T (=DSM 14867T=KCTC 3821T).
